date-and-time-required-for-completion: Date and Time required for completion
home-content-1: There are some things that still have to be done the old-fashioned way, and transcription is one of those. Although we can use new technologies to streamline the process; to do it right, and most accurately, it’s all about the human ear and eye. That’s why you need us, to automate the process for you. We'll help move your project on ... from audio to the page. Whether it's an academic report, a magazine article, a reality TV show, or a focus group. We'll use antique methods so you don't have to.
home-content-2: We understand that on any project, deadlines are important. That's why we offer extremely low rush rates. We can also offer an expedited rate with the fastest turnaround of just double the time. Give us an hour, we'll have it transcribed and back to you in 3. Place an order now for your rush project.
home-content-3: We offer services beyond transcription and can help you complete your project with subtitles, translations and even copy editing.
